start.content:
#!/bin/sh
. /home/engines/functions/trap.sh
PID_FILE=/home/engines/run/shiny.pid 
export PID_FILE

shiny-server /home/app/shiny.conf &
echo $! > $PID_FILE
startup_complete
wait
shutdown_complete

install.content:
#!/bin/sh
cd /tmp
wget http://download3.rstudio.org/ubuntu-14.04/x86_64/shiny-server-1.5.9.923-amd64.deb
whoami
ls -Rl /etc/sudoers.d/
sudo -n /usr/bin/gdebi -n /tmp/shiny-server-1.5.9.923-amd64.deb
rm /tmp/shiny-server-1.5.9.923-amd64.deb
